com.knowgate.misc

Class FLVParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.knowgate.misc.LINParser
      • com.knowgate.misc.FLVParser

  • public class FLVParser
extends LINParser

    Fixed Length Columns Text Parser

    Parses a text file with fixed length columns into a memory array

    Version:
    3.0
